title: 047 - Jonnie W -  Ant Farms, Lazy Susans and Jello
description:
Jonnie is ready to roll on the Poddy Bus! This week, Tim brings a Trump prophecy before the group. Caleb has a Freight-sperience at Home Depot. Jonnie has a feud with Jon Bon Jovi. And Freight hauls booty around the building to give some fans a photo op.
 Also on this episode: Jonnie eats all the bacon. Tim lives the thug life. Caleb can’t complete a drug test. Freight challenges Madonna to a wrestling match. Jonnie accidentally shaves his body. And the gang Freightbacks historical figures.
 Get your Poddy Break Merch! Click Here!!!!Follow us @poddybreakEmail us at poddybreak@rockshowcomedy.com  Click here to see Tim LIVE!!!
 Check out more of Jonnie W at http://www.jonniew.com/ Tweet him @jonnie_w

itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: What time is it? Oh, I got my clock right here...
